body:
Comment 2: 
The similarity to the gotest problem may well be a red herring, but here's a
us.stackdump file from a March 27, 2011 gotest crash. It looked quite similar to me.

MSYS-1.0.16 Build:2010-09-29 00:07
Exception: STATUS_ACCESS_VIOLATION at eip=60804550
eax=00000000 ebx=004D1B4C ecx=00000000 edx=60E900D4 esi=60E92414 edi=00000000
ebp=0028FF18 esp=0028FED0 program=us
cs=0023 ds=002B es=002B fs=0053 gs=002B ss=002B
Stack trace:
Frame     Function  Args
0028FF18  60804550  (6089C7A0, FFFFFFFE, 00000064, 6089C6A4)
0028FF58  60804B65  (00000000, 00000000, 00000000, 00000000)
0028FF78  0046F62F  (00401090, 037F0000, 0028FF94, 766F33CA)
0028FF88  0040103E  (7EFDE000, 0028FFD4, 77799ED2, 7EFDE000)
